member.name: MF_TOPOLOGY_RESOLUTION_STATUS_FLAGS
member.summary: Defines status flags for the MF_TOPOLOGY_RESOLUTION_STATUS attribute.

member.name: MF_TOPOLOGY_RESOLUTION_STATUS_FLAGS.MF_OPTIONAL_NODE_REJECTED_MEDIA_TYPE
member.summary: An optional topology node was rejected because the topology loader could not find a media type for the connection.

member.name: MF_TOPOLOGY_RESOLUTION_STATUS_FLAGS.MF_OPTIONAL_NODE_REJECTED_PROTECTED_PROCESS
member.summary: An optional topology node was rejected because it could not be loaded into a protected process.
